lines: Ngi tshel’ indaba ka Yesu, Yilob’ enhliziyweni;
Ngi tshel’ indab’ eligugu Ehlamusa kamnandi.
Ngi tshel’ indaba ka Jesu Yilob’ enhliziyweni;
Ngi tshel’ indaba eligugu Ehlamusa kamnandi.
Wazil’ eyedwa ehlane Yish’ ubunzima bAkhe;
Yisho umsebenzi wAkhe Yish’ ubunzima bAkhe,
Yisho nges’ phambano sAkhe Nomunyu wobuhlungu;
Yisho nangethuna lAkhe Yisho ngovuko lwAkhe.
Ngi thintwa yisis’ es’khulu Sicacile kakhulu,
